entry.title: What is the price of open source?
entry.summary:
Description

We keep hearing, that "open source if for free, so why don't you use it?" But is that really true? What are the real costs of open source software? Where does the money come from? How do the developers make their living? Is it really as free as a …
entry.content:
Description

We keep hearing, that "open source if for free, so why don't you use it?" But is that really true? What are the real costs of open source software? Where does the money come from? How do the developers make their living? Is it really as free as a beer? How to bring money to open source software development? Is open source the one and only greatest and only good and best possible development model?
